item.title: I keep getting this error that says
item.dc:creator: @melt_man1 melt man1
item.description:
@melt_man1 wrote:

Exception in thread “main” java.lang.NoSuchMethodError: main I can’t get it to work, here is my code.[code] private void calcFlamesPosition()

public static void main(string [] args)
{
    try
    {
        System.out.println("Nocturnal Pk Client Version #"+clientVersion);
        if(args.length != 2)
        {
            System.out.println("Usage: port-offset, [lowmem/highmem]");
            return;
        }
        nodeID = 0;
        isMembers = true;
        signlink.storeid = 32;[/code]Thanks in advance[img]http://s302.photobucket.com/albums/nn90/meltman1/?action-view&current=error.png[/img]

If you cant see the pic here is the url: http://s302.photobucket.com/albums/nn90/meltman1/?action=view&current=error.png
